alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hamilton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 11:14PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hamilton, Kearny, west central Finney, northwestern Grant and Stanton Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT/1100 PM MDT/... At 1113 PM CDT/1013 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow winds, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. Areas of blowing dust. SOURCE...Automated equipment. Syracuse Airport measured a wind gust of 50 mph at 1055 PM CDT. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Hamilton, Kearny, west central Finney, northwestern Grant and Stanton Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT/300 AM MDT/ for southwestern Kansas.
